title: 2021 (2022) GCE O/L from May 23 to June 1: Edu. Min. Secy
body_lines: The Education Ministry will conduct the 2021 (2022) GCE Ordinary Level (O/L) Examination from May 23 to June 1, 2022, Education Ministry Secretary Prof. Kapila Perera said.
Addressing the media at the information department today, he said all arrangements have been made by a team headed by the Examinations Department Commissioner General to conduct the examination.
According to the instructions of the Education Minister, arrangements have been made to complete the school term schedules until the end of this year, he said.
During the term schedule, the Ministry is hoping to conduct the GCE O/L, A/L and grade five scholarship exams before the end of the year, Prof. Perera added. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
